column4: can someone please help me figure out why i can't enable networking?

I was able to connect to the internet a couple of hours ago. Then my battery ran out, i restarted, and now the networking button on the upper right hand corner won't show up. I try to toggle fn F11, and it still doesn't show up
that button is the Network Manager Applet. Try typing Alt+F2 and running nm-applet.
